text:
I loved Karl's place! This was my 4th Air BnB, and my favorite so far. Nicely decorated, great-smelling, extremely clean, huge king-sized bed smothered in pillows, lovely plants & plenty of cooking supplies (french press, garlic press). The apartment is also extremely quiet even though it's on Newkirk Ave (it's high up & set back from the street). 



I also love this nabe -- coffee shops, laundy, the Q/B train, & groceries all extremely nearby (within a couple blocks). A short walk to restaurants, more grocery stores, & a health food store on Cortelyou. Cafe Tibet is delicious.



I didn't meet Karl in person, but he was extremely responsive and helpful before and throughout the stay.



I would love to stay here again & strongly recommend!
title: Cozy 1 bedroom in Ditmas Park
